title: Priority permitting process for renewable energy
context: [§46-19.4 Priority permitting process for renewable energy projects.] All agencies shall provide priority handling and processing for all county permits required for renewable energy projects. For purposes of this section, &ldquo;agencies&rdquo; means any executive department, independent commission, board, bureau, office, or other establishment of a county, or any quasi-public institution that is supported in whole or in part by county funds. [L 2007, c 205, §2] Cross References Other related sections, see §§196-1.5, 201-12.5, 201N-14, and 226-18&copy;(10).
